Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-bodyweight

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP65139-5 (Body weight), PROPERTY = LP6826-4 (Mass), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304481-7 (Body weight^with clothes), PROPERTY = LP6826-4 (Mass), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP304482-5 (Body weight^without clothes), PROPERTY = LP6826-4 (Mass), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsBodyWeight
title: Vital Signs - Body Weight
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing body weight vital sign measurements in Observation.code.
